detaileddescription.para: Section: Visualization Toolkit Geo Vis Classes

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: vtkGeoSampleArcs refines lines in the input polygonal data so that the distance between adjacent points is no more than a threshold distance. Points are interpolated along the surface of the globe. This is useful in order to keep lines such as political boundaries from intersecting the globe and becoming invisible.
To create an instance of class vtkGeoSampleArcs, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkGeoSampleArcs

sect1.title: Methods
sect1.para:
The class vtkGeoSampleArcs has several methods that can be used. They are listed below. Note that the documentation is translated automatically from the VTK sources, and may not be completely intelligible. When in doubt, consult the VTK website.
